showLoading.description: Whether to show loading animation display

role.description: Accessibility Attribute: Used to communicate an important and usually time-sensitive message to the user. When this role is added to an element, the browser will send out an accessible alert event to assistive technology products which can then notify the user about it. Additional options: https://www.w3.org/WAI/PF/HTML/wiki/RoleAttribute

ariaLabel.description: Accessibility Attribute: The aria-label attribute is used to define a string that labels the current element. Used in cases where a text label is not visible on the screen.

ariaLive.description: Accessibility Attribute: ARIA live regions provide a way to programmatically expose dynamic content changes in a way that can be announced by assistive technologies. Available Options: 1. aria-live='polite' indicates that the screen reader should wait until the user is idle before presenting updates to the user. This is the most commonly used value, as interrupting the user with 'assertive' might interrupt their flow. 2. aria-atomic is not set (false by default) so that only the added or removed users should be spoken and not the entire roster each time. 3. aria-relevant='additions removals' ensures that both users added or removed to the roster will be spoken. Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/ARIA_Live_Regions

isAriaBusy.description: Accessibility Attribute: ARIA-busy state should be used by the content authors when a portion on a web page has auto updating content. Ref:  http://www.maxability.co.in/2014/02/aria-busy/

showSorting.description: Whether to show sorting option. Only available for the following modules so far: Fares List_Mosaic Grid, Fares List_Horizontal Tile, Fares Filterable List_Horizontal Tile

defaultImage.description: Default Destination Image for cases where the destination location do not have an associated image. Future Implementation: The destination image will be automatically returned by the Fares Microservices when no location image is found.

additionalCssClasses.description: CSS Classes to be applied to the Slider

showGeneralDisclaimer.description: Whether to show module generic disclaimer at the UI level

showGeneralDisclaimerOnTop.description: Whether to show on top the module generic disclaimer at the UI level

showCallToAction.description: Whether to show Book CTA at the UI level

showPricing.description: Whether to show fare pricing at the UI level

showDiscountFare.description: Whether to show fare promo flag at the UI levele

showDots.description: Whether to show navigation dots at the UI level (Usually activated for 4 or less cards)

className.description: CSS Class for the component functionality

isScrollInfinite.description: Whether the infinite scroll behavior is to be activated

isLazyLoad.description: Whether is present lazy load for performance optimization

slidesToShowNumber.description: Default number of cards to show at the UI level

slidesToScrollNumber.description: Default number of cards when scrolling at the UI level

initialSlide.description: Initial slide to display when querying. Defaults to 0

showArrows.description: Whether to show right and left navigation arrows at the UI level

isAutoDisplay.description: Whether to activate autodisplay behaviour at the UI level

isRightToLeft.description: Whether to activate right to left depending on the language. Defaults to false

isFullWidth.description: Whether to show sorting full width at the UI level

showBlankOption.description: Whether to display the default sorting option in blank at the UI level

totalPrice.description: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

departureAirport.description: Airport details where the flight originates

departureCity.description: City details where the flight originates

arrivalAirport.description: Airport details where the flight terminates

arrivalCity.description: City details where the flight terminates

showArrivalAirportImage.description: Whether to show the arrival airport image at the UI level

showDepartureCityName.description: Whether to show the departure city name at the UI level

showDepartureAirportIataCode.description: Whether to show the departure airport IATA code at the UI level

showArrivalCityName.description: Whether to show the arrival city name at the UI level

showArrivalAirportIataCode.description: Whether to show the arrival airport IATA code at the UI level

showRoute.description: Whether to show the route at the UI level

showDepartureDate.description: Whether to show the departure date at the UI level

showReturnDate.description: Whether to show the return date at the UI level

showDateSeparator.description: Whteher to show date separator at the UI level

showJourneyType.description: Whether to show journey type at the UI level

showcurrency.description: Whether to show the price currency code at the UI level

showcurrencySymbol.description: Whether to show the price currency symbol at the UI level

templateLayout.description: Booking layout template display at UI level

controlsTemplateLayout.description: Template layout for controls refering to the labels and icons disposition

showTitle.description: Whether to show the booking mask title at UI level

showSubtitle.description: Whether to show the booking mask subtitle at UI level

isFocusOnCurrentField.description: Whether focus should be on current field

showErrors.description: Whether to show validation errors when interacting with the booking form

showJourneyTypes.description: Whether to show each journey type at the UI level

journeyTypes.description: Journey types display at the UI level

journeyTypeControl.description: Journey Type Control display at the UI level

showMultiCity.description: Whether to show multi city at the UI level

multiCityUrl.description: Journey types multi-city link to core website.

showAirportsList.description: Whether to show airports list at the UI level

airportsListMaxNumber.description: Maximun number of origin/destination airports to show

isAirportsClearableButton.description: Whether there is a button to clear airports list

isAirportsAutocomplete.description: Whether there is autocompletion on airport lists

airportsListFormat.description: Airports list format referrencing items visualization

airportsListFilteringPriority.description: Airports list filtering options when searching

datesFormatEdition.description: Dates format for edition configured on airTRFX CMS

datesFormatDisplay.description: Date format for display configured on airTRFX CMS

visibleMonthsMaxNumber.description: Maximum number of visible months when selecting the departure/return dates

showFlexibleDays.description: Whether to show flexible days around departure/return date at UI level

daysUntilReturnDate.description: Number of days until Retutn date for its autopopulation

showFareClasses.description: Whether to show each fare class at the UI level

fareClasses.description: Fare classes (Should be provided by the airline)

passengersType.description: Passengers type (Should be provided by the airline)

showDiscountCode.description: Whether to show the promotional code

isCallToActionDisabledOnError.description: Whether the Flight search initiation call to action button is disabled on error

PassengerCountByTypeMaxNumber.description: Maximum number of passenger by type

PassengerCountByTypeMinNumber.description: Minimum number of passenger by type

departureAirportIataCodeDefault.description: Departure airport IATA code for prepoluation

arrivalAirportIataCodeDefault.description: Arrival airport IATA code for prepopulation

flexibleDaysDefault.description: Number of days around departure/return date default value
